page.title: 06WOMEN'S INSTITUTE,DALWOOD
page.content: There are 9000 W.I's in England and Wales. Dalwood's W.I has 40 members.You have to be 16 years old to join the Dalwood W.I and it costs Â£4 a year.The meetings are held every first Wednesday of each month except August. The meeting always starts with the minutes which tells the people who weren't at the last meeting what happened in the last meeting.They also have a speaker to tell them different and interesting things.The Dalwood W.I has its own market at which they sell home made cakes, fruit,hand made toys and other things. They have a Christmas bazaar to raise money for charity. When the village school was threatened with closure several years ago, the W.I started a playgroup to support the school.
